name: Delivery Professional
description:
Delivery Professional is a game I have made for the Score Space Game Jam.

The objective is to get the highest score as possible by keeping all of the boxes balanced on your one trailer.  The high score is based off of how much time you played before dropping three boxes. Once three boxes have been dropped the game ends!

The controls are simple, click on boxes to move them around, arrange them as you like to be the best at balancing your boxes.

There is a slight bug when moving your mouse too quickly while holding a box, causing the box to be dropped.
